Summary: Lady at front desk Lied  and refused service when we questioned her attempt to scam extra $15.00  for the night . We are familiar with the rates because we stayed there  2 times before.  I never been helped by this lady before there was an older lady and gentlemen they were kind people this horrible lady though killed the quality of this place.  She yelled and gave me attitude for no reason. I never disrespected her or gave her any sort of attitude  having no rooms available  she replied "So What"  rolled her eyes and walked away from the desk. How Sad for her .. I'm never returning and I advise anyone not to stay there ,In case she tries to Scam You as well.
I looooooooooove this place, it's so clean, cozy, and just the right location , not too far from my house, nor his ;)

Summary Heading: Goldenwest Lodge Motel in Santa Ana, Ca
Summary: This place is a rip off if u do stay here give key/phone deposits cash and get a receipt i was charged $65 ($5 for key deposit included) on credit card when i went in morning to pay for another day was told $65 again i told her i paid deposit already but she freaked out said if she was gonna lose money if she gave me $5 cash because it was supposed to paid in cash in the first place, I wasn't welcomed there as she handed me my atm and id back and I needed to check-out at 11am. I wasn't going to pack my stuff up and look for antoher place! I told her to just forget about it AND SHE STILL WAS SO RUDE AND FREAKING OUT THROWING A TANTRUM....AND CHARGED $65!!!!!! I just walked away went to my room...
Room tip: get receipts and pay deposits in cash.
